translations: 法利赛人；伪善者；形式上遵守教义的人（Pharisee 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites!
sentences.translation: 你们这假冒为善的文士和法利赛人有祸了。

sentences.sentence: But woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites!
sentences.translation: 你们这假冒为善的文士和法利赛人有祸了。

sentences.sentence: Has any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed in him?
sentences.translation: 官长或是法利赛人岂有信他的呢？
